for <S%G3754><s%> <S%G228>true<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1342>righteous<s%> are <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G2920>judgments<s%>; <S%G3754>for<s%> he hath <S%G2919>judged<s%> the <S%G3173>great<s%> <S%G4204>harlot<s%>, her <S%G3748>that<s%> <S%G5351>corrupted<s%> the <S%G1093>earth<s%> <S%G1722>with<s%> <S%G846>her<s%> <S%G4202>fornication<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> he hath <S%G1556>avenged<s%> the <S%G129>blood<s%> of <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G1401>servants<s%> <S%G1537>at<s%> <S%G846>her<s%> <S%G5495>hand<s%>.

that <S%G2443><s%> ye may <S%G5315>eat<s%> the <S%G4561>flesh<s%> of <S%G935>kings<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G4561>flesh<s%> of <S%G5506>captains<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G4561>flesh<s%> of mighty <S%G2478>men<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G4561>flesh<s%> of <S%G2462>horses<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> of them that <S%G2521>sit<s%> <S%G1909>thereon<s%>, <S%G846><s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G4561>flesh<s%> of <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G1658>men<s%>, both free <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1401>bond<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3398>small<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3173>great<s%>.
